meanings.sent1: Don't be a schmuck and listen to your parents.
meanings.sent2: He's such a schmuck for not apologizing.
meanings.sent3: The schmuck at the store tried to cut in line.
meanings.sent4: His behavior made him the biggest schmuck in town.
meanings.sent5: Being a schmuck will only lead to trouble.

meanings.sent1: She called him a schmuck for forgetting her birthday.
meanings.sent2: Stop acting like a schmuck and help out.
meanings.sent3: The schmuck spilled his drink all over himself.
meanings.sent4: He's the biggest schmuck I've ever met.
meanings.sent5: Being a schmuck won't get you any friends.

meanings.sent1: He got hit in the schmuck during the game.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined his schmuck for any issues.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally zipped up his pants and caught his schmuck.
meanings.sent4: The cold water made his schmuck shrink.
meanings.sent5: He felt a sharp pain in his schmuck.
